short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes mobile wikipedia links to the web version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wikipedia's Mobile UI is ugly. This extension changes Wikipedia's mobile links to the scrumptious, magnificent, benevolent, incredible, majestic, perfect, angelic, resplendent, desktop UI.
